head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ROGOFF, SYLVIA (NEE SCHECTMAN)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ROGOFF, SYLVIA (NEE SCHECTMAN)

block.p: ROGOFF--Sylvia (nee Schectman), of Belle Harbor, died April 6, age 89. Beloved wife of the late Sam, mother of Arline Littman (Joe) and Jay Rogoff (Phillis), grandmother of Bonnie and Barry Littman, Bradley and Lauren Rogoff. Funeral Sunday, April 8, 12:30 pm, Boulevard-Riverside, 1450 Broadway, Hewlett.
